name: Treed
query: FOR_MGMT_LAND_BASE_IND = 'N' AND (INVENTORY_STANDARD_CD = 'F' AND NON_PRODUCTIVE_DESCRIPTOR_CD IS NOT NULL AND SPECIES_PCT_1 IS NOT NULL) OR (INVENTORY_STANDARD_CD IN ('I', 'V') AND SITE_INDEX < 5 AND SPECIES_CD_1 IS NOT NULL)

name: Non FWA wetland, water
query: FOR_MGMT_LAND_BASE_IND = 'N' AND (BCLCS_LEVEL_2 = 'W' OR (BCLCS_LEVEL_2 NOT IN ('W', 'T') AND BCLCS_LEVEL_3 = 'W')) AND BCLCS_LEVEL_5 <> 'OC'

name: Wildlife Habitat Area: No harvest
query: (TIMBER_HARVEST_CODE = 'NO HARVEST ZONE' AND FEATURE_NOTES NOT LIKE '%not a legal boundary%') OR(TIMBER_HARVEST_CODE = 'NO HARVEST ZONE' AND FEATURE_NOTES IS NULL)

name: Sea to Sky Wildland Zone
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Sea to Sky Land and Resource Management Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Wildland Area'

name: Special Wildland RMZ in Muskwa Kechia MA
Nlhaxten/Cayoosh Wildland Area
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Lillooet Land and Resource Management Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Wildland Area'

name: South Chilcotin Mountains Mining and Tourism Areas
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Lillooet Land and Resource Management Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Mining and Tourism Area'

name: Great Bear Rainforest (GBR) Special Forest Management Areas
Great Bear Rainforest (GBR) Landscape Reserve Design (LRD)
Class1 Coast Grizzly Bear Habitat (Coast LUP)
Atlin-Taku Forest Retention Areas
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Atlin - Taku Strategic Land and Resource Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Forest Retention Area'

name: Migratory Bird Sanctuaries
query: loc_e='British Columbia' AND biome = 'T' AND type_e = 'Migratory Bird Sanctuary'

name: Wildlife Habitat Area: Conditional harvest
query: (TIMBER_HARVEST_CODE = 'CONDITIONAL HARVEST ZONE' AND FEATURE_NOTES NOT LIKE '%not a legal boundary%') OR(TIMBER_HARVEST_CODE = 'NO HARVEST ZONE' AND FEATURE_NOTES IS NULL)

name: National Wildlife Areas
query: loc_e='British Columbia' AND biome = 'T' AND type_e = 'National Wildlife Area'

name: Forest Recreation Site
query: PROJECT_TYPE in ('Recreation Site', 'Recreation Trail','Recreation Reserve', 'Interpretative Forest') and FILE_STATUS_CODE = 'HI' and RETIREMENT_DATE IS NULL

name: Lakes South Landscape Corridor
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Lakes South Sustainable Resource Management Plan' AND LEGAL_FEAT_OBJECTIVE = 'Landscape Corridors'

name: Important Fisheries Watersheds (Great Bear Rainforest LUO)
Great Bear Rainforest (GBR) Ecosystem-based Management (EBM) Area
Haida Gwaii, Central Coast, North Coast Planning Areas
query: STRGC_LAND_RSRCE_PLAN_NAME = 'Haida Gwaii Land Use Objectives Order'
